job_description: SENIOR DEVELOPMENT ENGINEER - job post Horizon Consulting Inc. 22118 20th Ave SE, Bothell, WA 98021 Temporary You must create an Indeed account before continuing to the company website to apply Apply on company site save-icon Job details Job Type Temporary Brief Job Description Senior Development Engineer, as team lead, will manage the process of implementing improvements and new functionality in Salesforce.com/Oracle CPQ applications; deliver support and solutions for break/fix issues; communicate and collaborate with other technical resources and stakeholders regarding status, technical issues, and creative solutions; perform ongoing Salesforce/Oracle CPQ administration and development; ability to support Salesforce.com/Oracle CPQ configuration tasks, such as field/page updates, workflows, and automated approvals; handle numerous projects/priorities using proven project management methodologies and sound development practices to ensure the quality of delivery of enterprise solutions; interface with business analysts and technical staff and be responsible for delivering complete work projects; research integration issues and work closely with team members on operations and development staff; and research and develop new Salesforce.com/Oracle CPQ prototypes and applications. Position requires temporary travel to client sites at employerâ€™s expense. Skill Required: Experience must include developing software solutions using PHP, MySQL, Joomla, Windows Troubleshooting Platform, VB6, ColdFusion, VB.NET, Windows Forms, Salesforce.com, BigMachines/Oracle CPQ Cloud, .Net, and JavaScript. Requirements: Master's degree or its equivalent in Computer Science or related Information Technology field plus 24 months of experience in software development engineering role. Location : 22118 20th Avenue SE, Suite 122, Bothell, Washington 98021 Contact Horizon Consulting Inc hr@horizonconsulting-inc.com Benefits ( Benefits and Perks from HCI) Remote Working Flexible lifestyle along with shifts, complete the work and live your dream.
